title: Mobile Medication Platform - B2b Enterprise
text: Questions Business Summary For sale is one of the top mobile medication tracking platforms with 5 years of history. The platform empowers patients to adhere to a medication regimen and provide compliance visibility to caregivers. Focus is on patient health, reducing healthcare cost, and driving pharmaceutical revenue. The key value in this acquisition are the existing enterprise clients and the ability to expand enterprise licensing. Highlights & Key Assets: o Enterprise clients include some of the biggest in the health care space as well as a major nutritional retailer that provides instant credibility. o Relationship with major health care company to license the codebase to other 50% of their members for >$300k when they are ready to expand. o Relationship with major nutritional retailer worth $40k/year. o Relationship with major health care marketing organization and pharma company. o Research project with a children's hospital on this product's effectiveness o Subversion code repository. o App has been installed on over 650,000 user devices (either directly or via integration partners). o App listings in multiple app stores. This is a rare opportunity to acquire a top mobile medication platform that is poised for rapid expansion with the right new owner. Financials
